short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use your mobile to operate on web pages in your computer browser to login, subscribe, encrypt, or control any element in the page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Global Input App Extension makes your mobile device a secure and smart controller for your Chrome browser. This tool enables interaction with any web page element from your mobile device, streamlining tasks like login, form filling, and web navigation.
The extension allows you to interact with any web element from your mobile device, automating tasks like login and form completion. Information can be securely stored on your mobile device, transferring to your browser only when needed through end-to-end encryption and also with the ability to create Encrypted QR codes. You can create custom rules to identify and interact with specific page elements. The extension allows you to encrypt content on your mobile device before sending it to web storage services, ensuring your data remains protected and accessible only through your mobile app. As an open-source solution, you can integrate these capabilities directly into your own applications using our publicly available source code, enabling seamless mobile interoperability features.
